blocks.value: The ninth and lowest choir, simply called Angels, are the most familiar to human beings. They are the messengers and helpers in our daily lives.
These angels are sent by God to deliver messages, provide protection, and assist individuals in their spiritual journey. They interact most directly with the physical world.
From this choir come our Guardian Angels, each assigned by God to protect and guide a human soul from conception to death and beyond. They pray for us and inspire us toward holiness.
